briefTitle: Open-Label Clinical Study of Droxidopa in Patients With Neurogenic Orthostatic Hypotension (NOH)
officialTitle: An Open-label Study, to Assess the Long-term Safety and Clinical Benefit of Droxidopa in Subjects With PAF, Dopamine Beta Hydroxylase Deficiency or Non-diabetic Neuropathy and Symptomatic Neurogenic Orthostatic Hypotension
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the durability of effect of Droxidopa in treating symptoms of neurogenic orthostatic hypotension in patients with Primary Autonomic Failure (Pure Autonomic Failure, Multiple System Atrophy, Parkinson's Disease), Non-diabetic neuropathy, or Beta Hydroxylase deficiency.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Orthostatic Hypotension Questionnaire Composite Score (OHQ)
